title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 152.4 - Timely mailing treated as timely filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 152.4 - Timely mailing treated as timely filing

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 691(a)

Where any New York State income tax return required to
be filed within a prescribed period or on or before a prescribed date is mailed
in accordance with the provisions of section
2399.2
of this Title, such return will be deemed timely filed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
152.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
